reviews.review: This game is good to play with your friends.
Classic CS without skins , and with a "non-toxic" community , i believe.
Old but gold. Zombie Escape servers great!!
the game is a game good game and im game to play the game
This game is really Amazing ,Like for real :D
i love this game and their sprays hehe xd

Its fun to play old game lick This

I still like this more than any other fps since it reminds me of CS 1.6. Plus it runs well on low specs liek my laptops :d SO it runs on a intel hd 4600 pretty much maxed settings at 720p and still getting 60 fps with vsync on or 80-120 fps without...and also i remember playing it in a intel hd 4400. 

Anyway still loads of fun, especially the weapon maps like awp and gun maps, the knife maps or grenade maps are proper fun with unlimited respawn. A timeless game.

This is first place when it comes to ranking the Counter-Strike games. A remaster of CS 1.6 which makes it look a lot better, some new sounds and better graphics. When you get the game everything is there, no micro transactions for skins, no paid graffiti. Everything you want to do is there for you to do. Not a huge variety of servers to play on, but they are still thriving to this day and they have huge server populations when you play during the day. Lots of nice people and fun times to be had. Also it's very cheap for such a good game, even being only a dollar when you buy it during a sale. It's not intensive on your computer so you can play even on a garbage laptop or toaster. It's definitely worth playing with or without friends. Either way you're going to have a blast.
Nice to play with friend have fun~~
